welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Colleyville, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, friendly community, and rich history. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer and make unforgettable memories during your stay."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The largest terminal at DFW, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A modern terminal with a variety of dining and shopping options.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: The international terminal with direct flights to various destinations around the world.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily serving regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal F
terminals.description: The newest terminal at DFW, primarily serving American Airlines flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Addison Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Addison Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fort Worth Alliance Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Fort Worth Alliance Airport is a hub for shipping and receiving goods from around the world.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Meacham Field Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Meacham Field Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'FTW Airport WiFi' from the list of available networks.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Arlington Municipal Airport is a small, single-story building with basic amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private jet passengers, offering more luxurious amenities and services.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Love Field Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Southwest Airlines Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to Southwest Airlines, the largest carrier at Love Field Airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free Wi-Fi throughout the airport by connecting to the DAL Free Wi-Fi network.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redbird Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Redbird Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's complimentary WiFi network.
